title: Renew Your Vehicle Registration by Mail
text_content: DMV, vehicle registration renewal, mail, renewal notice, expiration date, pre-printed vehicle renewal notice, incorrect information, (804) 497-7100, customer service agent, registration renewal form, multi-year discount, two-year renewal, $2 discount, payment, Virginia Department of Motor Vehicles, Renewal Center, Richmond VA 23269-0001, delivery time, decals, U.S. mail
